BatchGetChannel.name: BatchGetChannel
BatchGetChannel.description: Grants permission to get multiple channels simultaneously by channel ARN.

BatchGetStreamKey.name: BatchGetStreamKey
BatchGetStreamKey.description: Grants permission to get multiple stream keys simultaneously by stream key ARN.

CreateChannel.name: CreateChannel
CreateChannel.description: Grants permission to create a new channel and an associated stream key.

CreateStreamKey.name: CreateStreamKey
CreateStreamKey.description: Grants permission to create a stream key.

DeleteChannel.name: DeleteChannel
DeleteChannel.description: Grants permission to delete a channel and channel's stream keys.

DeletePlaybackKeyPair.name: DeletePlaybackKeyPair
DeletePlaybackKeyPair.description: Grants permission to delete the playback key pair for a specified ARN

DeleteStreamKey.name: DeleteStreamKey
DeleteStreamKey.description: Grants permission to delete the stream key for a specified ARN

GetChannel.name: GetChannel
GetChannel.description: Grants permission to get the channel configuration for a specified channel ARN

GetPlaybackKeyPair.name: GetPlaybackKeyPair
GetPlaybackKeyPair.description: Grants permission to get the playback keypair information for a specified ARN

GetStream.name: GetStream
GetStream.description:
Grants permission to get information about the active (live) stream on a specified
                                                channel

GetStreamKey.name: GetStreamKey
GetStreamKey.description: Grants permission to get stream-key information for a specified ARN

ImportPlaybackKeyPair.name: ImportPlaybackKeyPair
ImportPlaybackKeyPair.description: Grants permission to import the public key.

ListChannels.name: ListChannels
ListChannels.description: Grants permission to get summary information about channels

ListPlaybackKeyPairs.name: ListPlaybackKeyPairs
ListPlaybackKeyPairs.description: Grants permission to get summary information about playback key pairs

ListStreamKeys.name: ListStreamKeys
ListStreamKeys.description: Grants permission to get summary information about stream keys

ListStreams.name: ListStreams
ListStreams.description: Grants permission to get summary information about live streams

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to get information about the tags for a specified ARN

PutMetadata.name: PutMetadata
PutMetadata.description: Grants permission to insert metadata into an RTMP stream for a specified channel

StopStream.name: StopStream
StopStream.description: Grants permission to disconnect a streamer on a specified channel

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to add or update tags for a resource with a specified ARN

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove tags for a resource with a specified ARN

UpdateChannel.name: UpdateChannel
UpdateChannel.description: Grants permission to update a channel's configuration
